mapper.sql: SELECT id, tenant_id, tenant_code, tenant_name, tenant_type, expire_time, parent_tenant_id, tenant_contact, tenant_phone, tenant_email, isolation_level, max_user_num, audit_status, audit_by, audit_time, create_by, create_name, create_time, update_by, update_name, update_time, deleted FROM sys_tenant_data
